thread.section_title: Prime Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good stay.
thread.title_full: Good stay. - Review of Prime Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Yuri P
title: Good stay.
text: Good location walking distance to subway as well as to main shopping area in different direction. Large clean room (showing though some age). Several english channels on TV. Free reasonable speed internet. Had some problem with drainage in shower. Also very good exchange rate in the hotel, basically no commission. Would recommend overall.
